page.title: 10The Youth Club, St.Mary.
page.content: A youth club is a place to have fun. To meet new friends. You can play outside or inside. You can go and have something to eat if you want to. To join the club you need 20p. The age range is 9 to 19 years. Juniors 9-13 Wed. 7-9 40 people. Seniors 13-19 Fri. 7.30-10.00 90 people. It is a good idea to have youth clubs because you can get away from your family and help you to become independent; it will give you something to do after school. They need more people to help look after the children. Activities consist of football, roller hockey, netball, cricket, rowing, rounders, pool, snooker, tabletennis, bingo and a raffle. The downstairs room is a disco room and canteen. Upstairs is a games area and stage. They have holidays at Crabbe. Mr.Munns is one of the Club's helpers.
